p: Overall, the highest influenza hospitalization rates were observed in age‐group ≥80 years with an average of 134 hospitalizations per 100 000 inhabitants per season, followed by age‐groups 60‐79 years (36/100 000) and <20 years (32/100 000). Within the age‐group <20 years, the hospitalization rate was particularly high in the <5 years (93/100 000). Hospitalization rates were lower in age‐group 20‐59 years every season.
